item.description:
I am hosting this event, please come!

Come join us again for a lovely Sunday Morning Brunch at the Gaslight. This is a great way to start (finish?) the week. Twenty to thirty of us will be enjoying each other's stories, humor, conversations over a delicious (and inexpensive) meal: the Prix Fixe menu is just $9.95 and includes a choice of 3 entrees, two juices, cofffee or tea and a sweet ala Julia Child! (Taxes & Gratuity not included).

Free parking adjacent to the restaurant!

Attendees pay server; Paypal is not accepted at ths event!

Limited to 25, RSVPS required.

Many of us will walk over to the Winter South End Markets (indoors) to peruse the fresh veggies, quality crafts, etc.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have our own section
item.name: Sunday Brunch at The Gaslight
